      • set_card_at_index

        public void set_card_at_index(int card_index,
                              Card card)
        Transformer sets a certain card for the hand of the player
        Parameters:
        card - is the card to be added
        card_index - the place for the card to be added
        Precondition:
        card_index is [0,3] and card is not null
        Postcondition:
        the card has been added to the hand of the player

        Postcondition:
